name: NAMDEV BAHUUDESIYA  SEVABHAVI SANSTHA
briefDescription: Namdev bahuudesiya Seva Bhavi Sanstha ,started operations As per Bombay Public Trust Act 1950 ( Clue 19) in 2009 with the mission of providing a full range of financial services to the economically active poor who are not adequately served by financial institutions. Presently, our operations is spread across Nanded District within 89 Villages , We serve over 1 lac active customers through our 75 SHGâ€™s . SHG registration and Bank Linkage Programme. Janai business is primarily based on the joint liability group lending model for providing collateral free, small ticket-size loans to economically active poor women. we are tie up with nabard in feature .
